DOC.brief_summary: The propose study randomize control trial test effectiveness primary care , family-centered child obesity prevention program beginning pregnancy continue throughout first three year life compare routine standard care . The study aim reduce prevalence obesity age three , improve child diet composition healthy lifestyle behavior . Pregnant woman enrol large urban medical center serve primarily low-income immigrant Latino family . The intervention `` Starting Early '' consist three component . 1 ) Family Groups : interactive group coordinate child 's primary care visit lead Nutritionist/ Child Developmental Specialist . 2 ) Nutritional Video : culturally-specific bilingual early nutrition video incorporate family group discussion . 3 ) Plain Language Handouts : give reinforce curriculum family group . Hypothesis : Compared control , intervention group show reduce obesity improve parent feed knowledge increase healthy feeding attitude , style practice
